products.title: Crown Navy Bronze Roller Blind
products.description: With is unique print, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the uniqe print on the front of this blind, you can add a touch of style and class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Crown navy bronze roller blind.

products.title: Ritz Luxury Cream Roller Blind
products.description: This blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Piazza Modena Roller Blind
products.description: This unique design is perfect for kitchen and bathroom windows as it is 100% waterproof and blackout. The colour will not fade and being moisture resistant means it can be installed in bathrooms - guaranteed to add a splash of style. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower.

Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Beige - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a modest look with soothing shade, choose the roma (fr) in beige, which hosts a calming oatmeal hue on a crisp and contemporary cloth. The modern style and adjustable slats of the blind allow you to create a chic display that lets you control the amount of light and air entering the room. Match the beige with harmonising walls in a sumptuous biscuit shade, adding a deeper taupe to accent the tone of the blind and for an assortment of similar hues.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Almond - Vertical Blind
products.description: The nutty, creamy oatmeal of the almond, and the subtle style that it emits, belies its highly practical qualities. The roma (fr) range is flame-retardant, making it perfect for either a commercial property or a domestic one, and the louvres are easily adjusted to allow you more or less light or privacy. Feeling bold? Hang the almond against a bold, tropical purple feature wall in the dining room, where it will provide a necessary break to a bold, albeit beautiful, shade.
